explains: v. 气喘，喘息；气喘吁吁地说；气喘吁吁地跑；渴望（pant for）；<文>（心）剧跳，（胸部）剧烈起伏
n. 气喘，喘息；<文> 心跳，胸部的起伏；喷气声

sentences.en: What makes you pant so, my friend?'
sentences.cn: 我的朋友，你怎么气喘吁吁的？

sentences.en: At first we pant like a little doggy, and then we close our mouth.
sentences.cn: 一开始我们要像小狗一样喘息，然后闭上嘴。

sentences.en: "The shell masks the pilings so that the house doesn't look like it's standing with its pant legs pulled up," said Huff.
sentences.cn: “外壳掩盖了里面的桩子，这样房子看起来就不像拉着裤腿站着。”赫夫说。
